repoList.altText: A screenshot of a Random Quote Machine Website built by Tyler Moeller
repoList.description: A website that provides random quotes from the Forismatic API.
repoList.name: Random Quote Machine

repoList.altText: A screenshot of a Tic-Tac-Toe Website built by Tyler Moeller
repoList.description: Tic-Tac-Toe in JavaScript with basic AI, making it challenging yet beatable.
repoList.name: Tic-Tac-Toe

repoList.altText: A screenshot of a website that uses the Twitch.TV API built by Tyler Moeller
repoList.description: An example of using the Twitch.tv API to get information about specific channels.
repoList.name: Twitch.tv API Example

repoList.altText: A screenshot of a Simon Says Website built by Tyler Moeller
repoList.description: A game of Simon Says, written in JavaScript.
repoList.name: Simon Says

repoList.altText: A screenshot of a Website built by Tyler Moeller that lets you search Wikipedia
repoList.description: An example of using the WikiMedia API to search for Wikipedia Articles.
repoList.name: Wikipedia Search Viewer

repoList.altText: A screenshot of the Node.js learnyounode workshop completed by Tyler Moeller
repoList.description: A collection of answers for the NodeSchool workshops I have completed so far. I am continuing to finish new exercises regularly and help others do the same in regular NodeSchool meetups.
repoList.name: NodeSchool Workshops Completed

repoList.altText: A screenshot of a local weather Website built by Tyler Moeller
repoList.description: An example of using the Weather Underground API to get current weather conditions for any city.
repoList.name: Current Weather in Any City

repoList.altText: A screenshot of a Pomodoro Session Timer Website built by Tyler Moeller
repoList.description: A pomodoro timer for tracking your pomodoro sessions!
repoList.name: Pomodoro Timer

repoList.altText: A screenshot of a JavaScript Calculator Website built by Tyler Moeller
repoList.name: Calculator

repoList.altText: A screenshot of a Motivational Poster Generator Website built by Tyler Moeller
repoList.description: A website that generates random "Motivational" posters thanks to the Wikiquote and Unsplash APIs.
repoList.name: Motivational Poster Generator

repoList.altText: A screenshot of an Example NodeSchool Survey built by Tyler Moeller
repoList.description: An example survey page, designed like Google Forms, for reaching out to NodeSchool participants for feedback after a Meetup event. Responses intended for survey-maker, a REST-based server for conducting simple surveys.
repoList.name: NodeSchool Survey Example
